findings.title: newOwner function missing onlyOwner modifier
findings.explanation: The function newOwner is external and lacks the onlyOwner modifier, allowing any user to assign arbitrary addresses as owners and gain unauthorized privileges.
findings.fix_suggestion: Restrict access by adding the onlyOwner modifier to newOwner, e.g.: `function newOwner(address _owner) onlyOwner external returns (bool) { ... }`.

findings.title: Root owner can delete itself
findings.explanation: The deleteOwner function allows the root owner to delete itself by calling deleteOwner(root), setting owners[root] to zero and locking out all privileged functions.
findings.fix_suggestion: Add a guard to prevent removing the root address, e.g.: `require(_owner != root, "Cannot remove root owner");` at the start of deleteOwner.
